thread.title: Life in limbo: Vietnamese immigrants deported by U.S.

title: Life in limbo: Vietnamese immigrants deported by U.S.
text:
Life in limbo: Vietnamese immigrants deported by U.S. Friday, April 20, 2018 - 02:07 
Pham Chi Cuong and at least three other deportees who had lived in America for decades were returned to Vietnam in December 2017 as part of a renewed Trump administration push to deport immigrants convicted of crimes in the United States.   
Pham Chi Cuong and at least three other deportees who had lived in America for decades were returned to Vietnam in December 2017 as part of a renewed Trump administration push to deport immigrants convicted of crimes in the United States.  //reut.rs/2HRkGWE
